column3: Latest;Kampot: A foreigner died in Kampot province. ------ESKO TAPIO HEINONEN
column5: passed away in Kompong Bork Village
column6: on the outskirts of Kampot city
column8: 2019.------He had been diagnosed with acute pneumonia by doctors. The body was sent to the cemetery at the Khmer-Soviet Friendship Hospital in Phnom Penh.
